mdRecord.dcterms:title: Village Scene, Southwest United States, ca. 1893
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This photograph shows a village in the American southwest ca 1893 containing both wooden and adobe structures. A horse is in the background. A child climbs a ladder to the roof of one of the houses, while staring at the camera His parent sleeps on the ground to his left. Overall image slightly faded to yellowish brown
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
